altername_name: Aoki Ookami to Shiroki Mejika: Genchou Hishi
Aoki Ōkami to Shiroki Mejika: Genchō Hishi
Aoki Ookami to Shiroki Meshika: Genchou Hishi
Genghis Khan II: Clan of the Gray Wolf
name: Genghis Khan II: Clan of the Gray Wolf
overview: Unleash Mongol Hordes! In an age of conflict, you have been chosen to rule. Military strength, as well as political artistry must be used to build an empire that spans the continents. Legendary sages and warriors will be your companions - or your bitter foes! Lead your knights, samurai and elephants across the blazing sands of Arabia, through the Burmese jungle and into the grassy hills of the British Isles. Cross the Silk Road with Marco Polo and debate policy with Thomas Aquinas. Give the order to attack from the safety of your fortress or march to war at the head of your legions. Be careful to groom a successor and your great dynasty will live on. Soon all will bow before your might! - Conquer Mongolia or the entire world - Play Genghis Khan, King John, Philip II or any of 12 other world-class rulers - Choose from 16 historical military units, including knights, samurai and war elephants
